by an event beyond the control of the participant such as an illness accident casualty or other similar extraordinary and unforeseeable event and that would result in severe financial hardship to the participant if the early payment were not permitted the participant must supply written evidence of the financial hardship and must declare under penalty of perjury that the participant no other
